++ Conflicts of the Neogi

A book of recent history containing events in the [Greater Alfitaria] region related to Neogi raids and expansion.
 
    [Cabilis] - Korred village, they do mining tributes to their Neogi superiors
    [Grobb] - Firbolg village, they do farming tributes to their Neogi superiors
    [Lilt] - Lilty village, relatives of the Vegepygmies, offer their young as tribute (onion people)
    [Rivervale] - Diverse village where slaves are kept to build war equipment for the Neogi
